An individual post follows.

Tonight’s Show: Mashups/Bootlegs

Well folks, it’s been a blogless week, and for that I apologize. But I’ve put together a damn entertaining show for this evening’s regular broadcast on WMBC. It’s an hour of mashups, aka bootlegs (or “bootys” if you’re really British). Mashups are wonderful things: unlikely and illegally produced amalgamations of pop songs that add worth to otherwise dull radio fodder. Check out a good review of a typical mashup compilation album, or have a gander at Boom Selection, the essential bootleg blog. I’ve thrown in a fair variety for the evening’s show, so listen, enjoy, and hope the FCC isn’t listening too ^_^

—Nov 05, 2002
